title: player [REMOVED] is a troll, inter and rage quitter
body: player [REMOVED - [REPORTING OTHER PLAYERS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)] is a troll, inter and rage quitter  do not play with this player, he will sook about being killed and then rage quit, i dont know why this piece of trash plays pvp games if his gonna sook about losing, and quit when his not snowballing,  players like this should not be allowed to play ranked, because it ruins the game for everyone on their team and ruins our chance of winning because his a selfish little shitt and gives the trash on the other team a free win they didnt earn or deserve, im putting a post up about this because riot isnt gonna do a damm thing, even if you report them

replies.body:
I love how self inflicting this post obviously is.

"i dont know why this piece of trash plays..."

"selfish little shitt"

"trash on the other team"

With this attitude it's a miracle you've won any games.
